actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the Salmon River in Idaho as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic rivers Act by designating a specified portion of the Salmon River, Idaho, as a wild river. Directs the Secretaries of Agriculture and Interior to cooperate with relevant State and local governments and the interested public in the development of a management plan for the area.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the Salmon River in Idaho as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
